For those having an issue with Chapter 6 not loading, go to http://www.engamers.com/2009/12/01/download-patch-warcraft-3-the-frozen-throne-1-24c/ and download the "Patch Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne Upgrade 1.24b to 1.24c English ( War3TFT_124b_124c_English.exe )" patch. Run the patch and it should work afterward, at least it did for me.

RED THIS FOR COMPLETE CAMPAIN USE.

To play as other races you need to complete the humain campain, but you cant play the 6th chapter.
So i've found this cheat to skip to other races
When playing a humain chapter press enter and typ this
motherland (Race) (chapter)

Example:
motherland undead 1

And you will jump to the undead chapter 1.
